html:
Sept 8 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Asos Plc, Deutsche Telekom AG and Siemens Energy AG, on Wednesday.


HIGHLIGHTS


* Asos Plc ASOS.L: Exane BNP Paribas cuts to neutral from outperform

* Deutsche Telekom AG DTEGn.DE: Bernstein initiates with outperform rating

* Erste Group Bank AG ERST.VI: Deutsche Bank raises to buy from hold

* Pirelli & C SpA PIRC.MI: HSBC raises to buy from hold

* Siemens Energy AG ENR1n.DE: JP Morgan cuts to neutral from overweight

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Wednesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* 888 Holdings Plc 888.L: Jefferies raises target price to 480p from 460p
